mapper.select: select p.p_name, p.p_price, c.cart_no, c.cart_price, c.cart_cnt, c.cart_delivery, c.cart_pay, p.p_no from cart c inner join product p on c.p_no = p.p_no inner join member m on c.m_no = m.m_no where c.m_no = #{m_no}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_no, m_no, p_no, cart_price, cart_cnt, cart_delivery, cart_pay) values(msix_cart_seq.nextval, #{m_no}, #{p_no}, #{cart_price}, #{cart_cnt}, #{cart_delivery}, #{cart_pay})
